name: Potio Mellow
description:
WELCOME TO POTIO MELLOW


Potio Mellow is a turn based collectathon where you stack cards to collect herbs, materials, and craft equipment.



At the end of every action you'll need to end the turn - so make sure you collected enough materials 🌿

Features


🎴45+ Cards to collect
✅ 20+ Quests to complete
🎁 5+ Secret Items



Join our Discord server. Let us know what you think about the Potio Mellow and please consider rating the game!
